definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: Even her soul, so strong for rhapsody, was not enough.
sentences.chinese: 甚至于她那特别善于狂想的灵魂也不足挂齿。

sentences.english: We even beat your Arsenal, " Zhura noted.
sentences.chinese: 甚至于，我们还击败了你们的阿森纳。

sentences.english: They are all quite old, smiple and crude. Some are even made only by connecting two stones.
sentences.chinese: 有些甚至于只是两条长长的麻石砖拼接成的。

sentences.english: The true traveler is he who goes on foot, and even then, he sits down a lot of the time.
sentences.chinese: 真正的旅者是用步行的，甚至于他花很多的时间坐著。

sentences.english: Even control structures rely on it.
sentences.chinese: 甚至于控制结构都依赖它。

sentences.english: Department of individual and classical money can use cupreous body aureate, even diamond is enchased.
sentences.chinese: 个别经典款系会使用铜身镀金，甚至于有钻石镶嵌。

sentences.english: He had even been kept out of school during the busiest seasons.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至于在农忙的时候被阻止去上学。

sentences.english: I fell to the ground so heavily that I broke my left leg.
sentences.chinese: 我重重地摔到地上，甚至于左腿骨折了。

definition: at the minimum/at the very least
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
so much so that/to the extent that/even
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
and even/to go so far as to
